snippet: The Obama administration’s latest proposal again protects both religious liberties and women’s right to affordable birth control.
abstract: Editorial praises Obama administration proposal that would allow religious institutions to avoid paying for birth control for their employees while still ensuring that such women retain coverage; notes reasonable compromise of putting burden on insurance companies, not employers, to provide free contraceptive coverage to women.  .
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration’s latest proposal again protects both religious liberties and women’s right to affordable birth control.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
